properties.title: the Web Service, SOA and SOAP Testing Tool

section.name: contact us!
section.p: We created soapUI for its users, please let us know how it's working for you, how it troubles you, how you would like to see it improved, how you would like to integrate it with your own projects or offerings or just how you would like us to write or talk about it...
Just send an email to info.at.eviware.com to share your thoughts, ideas and ramblings and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you!
